title: PRICE DROP! 1887-88 Allen & Ginter N28 Set 9 of 10 - Fronts are pack fresh!
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: PRICE DROP! 1887-88 Allen & Ginter N28 Set 9 of 10 - Fronts are pack fresh!
posts.post_content:
Price drop!  Up for sale is a set (minus Cap Anson) of N28 Allen & Ginters.  The fronts are virtually pack fresh, but the backs have some issues of course.  All uniformly graded sgc 1.  $3200 + fees/shipping takes them!
